about.headline: Springhill Suites Vernal
content: The SpringHill Suites Vernal Utah is conveniently located near the oil and gas industries, as well as the Dinosaur National Monument and a variety of outdoor adventures. The Dinosaur National Monument is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. Vernal Golf Course is only a 5-minute drive from Springhill Suites, and numerous shops and restaurants are also nearby.

Springhill Suites Vernal is Uintah Basin's first choice for business travel or fun for the family. Treat yourself to spacious, stylish suites featuring complimentary Wi-Fi, separate sleeping and working areas, and Flat TVs.
Energize the morning with our complimentary daily breakfast and hearty favorites, or maintain your health in the well-lit, well-equipped fitness center.

room.headline: Rooms & Suites are Packed with Top-notch Amenities
content: Each room has a mini-fridge, microwave, and separate work and living area with free WiFi. The dining options include BBQ/picnic areas, a complimentary hot breakfast buffet, and a sundries store. Relax in our indoor pool and hot tub after a workout in our 24-hour fitness center. Enjoy Vernal's lovely weather in our outdoor pool or gather around the firepit in comfy, plush discussion areas.
